scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit && npm run test-smoke
scripts.test-smoke: concurrently --kill-others "npm run build && PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 node build/server.js"  "npx jest server/smoke.test.js" -s first
scripts.test-access: npm install --no-save puppeteer && wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:3000 && pa11y-ci --config '.pa11yci.json'
scripts.access: concurrently --kill-others "npm run build && PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 node build/server.js" "npm run test-access" -s first
scripts.build:frontend:
cd build && rm -rf public && mkdir public && cd .. && cp server/public/index.html build/public && echo "
-- Copied public/index.html to build folder --
"
scripts.build:server: babel server -d build --ignore '**/*.test.js' && cp server/*.json build
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:frontend
